ProductCategoryProduct.name: ProductCategoryProduct
ProductCategoryProduct.description: Holds the relation between product and product category to assign products to a category.

Catalog.description: The foreign key to the ProductCatalog ID of the Category.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Possible values are: EUR—Euro USD—U.S. Dollar The default value is USD.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date after which the catalog is unavailable to end users.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date on which the catalog is available to end users.

IsPrimaryCategory.description: Indicates if the ProductCategory is the primaryProductCategory for a given product in a ProductCatalog. The default value is false.

ProductCategory.description: Foreign key to the ProductCategory ID.

ProductToCategory.description: Concatenated Product ID and Category ID.

Status.description: The lifecycle state of the catalog. Possible values include: Draft, Active, Inactive
